alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Hill; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central McLennan, east central Bosque and southwestern Hill Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Meridian, or 10 miles north of Clifton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Whitney, Laguna Park, Lake Whitney, Aquilla Lake, Lake Whitney State Park, Gholson, Cedar Shores, Lakewood Harbor, Aquilla, Rock Creek, Womack, Peoria, Lakeside Village, and Cayote. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 363 and 368. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
